7.title: Theme Features
7.text:
[row]
[span4][content_box  title="Responsive" icon="/wp-content/themes/realia/assets/img/icons/features-responsive.png"]Realia is ready to put your website on higher ranks. Every line of code was developed with SEO principles in mind.[/content_box][/span4]

[span4][content_box title="Retina Ready" icon="/wp-content/themes/realia/assets/img/icons/features-retina.png"]Realia looks great even on Retina and high-resoultion displays. Every graphic element is sharp and clean. No blurry images anymore![/content_box][/span4]

[span4][content_box title="SEO Ready" icon="/wp-content/themes/realia/assets/img/icons/features-seo.png"]Realia is ready to put your website on higher ranks. Every line of code was developed with SEO principles in mind.[/content_box][/span4]
[/row]

[row]
[span4][content_box  title="Custom Widgets" icon="/wp-content/themes/realia/assets/img/icons/features-custom-widgets.png"]Realia is ready to put your website on higher ranks. Every line of code was developed with SEO principles in mind.[/content_box][/span4]

[span4][content_box title="Frontend Submission" icon="/wp-content/themes/realia/assets/img/icons/features-pencil.png"]Make the portal solution from your real estate by providing property submission on homepage.[/content_box][/span4]

[span4][content_box title="Prepared for Bootstrap" icon="/wp-content/themes/realia/assets/img/icons/features-bootstrap.png"]Developer friendly code based on Bootstrap and SASS makes your own customizations really easy.[/content_box][/span4]
[/row]
